boofcv.app

Class CreateFiducialSquareImage

  • java.lang.Object
    • boofcv.app.BaseFiducialSquare
      • boofcv.app.CreateFiducialSquareImage

  • public class CreateFiducialSquareImage
extends BaseFiducialSquare
    Outputs an EPS document describing a binary square fiducial that encodes the specified number
